pr_title: Implement getLineStream(), getLines(), getDanglingLineStream() and getDanglingLines() in BusAdapter

timeline.message:
Implement getLineStream(), getLines(), getDanglingLineStream() and getDanglingLines() in BusAdapter

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Correction: return wrapped objects

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Correction: return wrapped objects

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText:
I think it's not efficient to implement thinks like this: to create the Iterable, you will iterate over all the elements (collect), and then the client of the API will also do it, so the list is read twice.
I think it would be better to use Iterables.concat(). There is exactly the same issue in the MergingViewIndex... we should fix
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.message:
Move the methods

Signed-off-by: Mathieu BAGUE <mathieu.bague@rte-france.com>
